name: Tezos Genesis Block
description:
An artistic representation of the Tezos Genesis Block, minted on June-30-2018 at 20:07:32 with hash BLockGenesisGenesisGenesisGenesisGenesisf79b5d1CoW2

This artwork is part of the Coilgram series, which is telling the history of blockchains through artistic representations of iconic moments (like genesis or fork) identified by specific blocks of the chain. The algorithm, coded in Processing language, uses the hash of a block to map the block into a deterministic representation tokenized as an NFT (read more at bit.ly/coilgrams).  This is the very first Coilgram minted on a different blockchain than Ethereum. 

The Coilgram is essentially based on the idea of perturbing a spiral with Perlin noise and then repeating the task many times. In this sense, Greek Pi is a crucial number for this artwork. For such a reason, I decided to mint 314 editions each listed for 3.14 XTZ. Grab yours!
